Figma Tokens Demo

Syncing Figma Variables to Github

By David Sanderson

figma-tokens repo

Problem

  • It's hard to implement pixel figma designs!

Goal

  • reduce friction between figma design system and ticketing implementation by sharing tokens.

Approach

  • make figma variables the source of truth for all downstream web apps (and possibly more?).

Designer Workflow

  • a designer makes update(s) to a variable in figma.
  • using the Tokens Studio Figma Plugin, a designer pushes the updated tokens (w3c compliant design tokens) to github and opens a PR on the develop branch.

Developer Workflow

  • when a pr is opened, a github action is triggered which examines the updates tokens.json file and builds our updated css using style dictionary
  • a developer(s) reviews the PR and approves/requests changes.
  • upon approval, a developer adds the "version bump" label to the PR.
  • adding the 'version bump' label triggers a github action which adds a git release tag and bumps the version.
  • a developer creates a release from the tag in github.
  • Creating a release from the tag in github triggers a github action which publishes a release to NPM.

Questions?
